current_todos.notes: Certificate valid until Apr 19, 2026. Check again in March.

current_todos.task: Investigate SSH attack spike and consider fail2ban
current_todos.notes: SSH attacks jumped from 110/hour to ~18,762/hour. System handling it fine (load 0.45), but this is a significant increase. fail2ban not installed. Attacks are all random usernames, no targeted attacks on novakj.

completed_todos.task: Add backlog threshold rule to idea-maker prompt
completed_todos.notes: CLAUDE.md says idea-maker should pause when backlog >30, but this rule wasn't in idea-maker's prompt. Backlog was at 44 TODO tasks and idea-maker kept creating new tasks. Added explicit 'BACKLOG THRESHOLD' rule to idea-maker/prompt.md to pause when 30+ TODO tasks exist.

completed_todos.task: Fix maintenance.sh grep pattern causing integer expression error
completed_todos.notes: Fixed grep pattern on line 103: was using '^### TASK-.*TODO' which never matches (wrong format). Changed to '**Status**: TODO' which correctly identifies backlog count. Also manually ran archive-tasks.sh to archive 10 VERIFIED tasks (tasks.md was at 103KB, now 82KB).

completed_todos.task: Review all agent prompts for consistency
completed_todos.notes: Verified: All 7 agent prompts (idea-maker, project-manager, developer, developer2, tester, security, supervisor) have SYSTEM CONTEXT header.

Tester is now performing comprehensive regression testing: validated all 30 JSON files, checked all 27 pages for HTTP 200, verified API data structure. High concern from earlier resolved - tester behavior improved.
Baseline established: Cron active, disk 5%, memory 1.9Gi/7.6Gi, web app responding 200, all JSON files valid.

completed_todos.task: Check task flow health (TODO -> DONE -> VERIFIED)
completed_todos.notes: Found 48 TODO tasks, 0 IN_PROGRESS/DONE/FAILED. Tasks may be getting archived quickly after VERIFIED status. Created follow-up todo to investigate.

completed_todos.task: Validate all JSON files in /api/ directory
completed_todos.notes: All JSON files valid. No broken files found.

completed_todos.task: Investigate why task flow shows 48 TODO but no IN_PROGRESS/DONE
completed_todos.notes: Resolved: Previous grep pattern was wrong (searching for 'Status:' instead of '**Status**:'). Actual counts: 47 TODO, 8 VERIFIED. Task flow is healthy - IN_PROGRESS/DONE states are transient.

completed_todos.task: Fix Python boolean error in cron-orchestrator.sh
completed_todos.notes: Fixed: update_orchestrator_status() was passing bash 'true'/'false' directly to Python heredoc, causing 'name true/false is not defined' errors. Added conversion to Python 'True'/'False' booleans.

observations.note: Twenty-third supervisor run: System healthy. Cron active, disk 6%, memory 17% (1.3Gi/7.6Gi), web app 200 OK, all 100 JSON files valid. Task flow: 25 TODO, 0 IN_PROGRESS, 4 DONE, 0 VERIFIED - strong backlog reduction continues (30->25). Idea-maker continues to respect backlog threshold (log shows 'Backlog at capacity' with 35 tasks). Tester's 15:47 run validated 94 JSON files and tested pages - comprehensive regression testing confirmed. 4 DONE tasks (TASK-107, 041, 069, 135) await verification by tester. 15 active log files in last hour. SSH attacks at 23,573 with 841/hour rate (slightly down from 960/hour). Load average 1.07 - healthy. Uptime nearly 2 days. tasks.md reduced to 49KB (from 96KB) - agents clearing backlog effectively. All main pages return HTTP 200. Tester currently running. All systems nominal.

Twenty-fourth supervisor run: System healthy. Cron active, disk 6%, memory 17% (1.3Gi/7.6Gi), web app 200 OK, all 104 JSON files valid. Task flow: 23 TODO, 0 IN_PROGRESS, 0 DONE, 8 VERIFIED - backlog continues downward (25->23), now below threshold so idea-maker is creating tasks again (created TASK-155 at 17:01). Tester verified 3 tasks (TASK-020, 011, 105) with comprehensive regression (101 JSON, 5 pages). All 7 main pages return HTTP 200. SSH attacks at 23,746 (+173 from last run) with reduced rate of 104/hour (significant improvement from 841/hour). Load average 0.47 - healthy. Uptime 2 days. Log sizes stable (~2.2MB total, 549 files). tasks.md at 59KB. All systems nominal.

Twenty-fifth supervisor run: System healthy. Cron active, disk 6%, memory 17% (1.3Gi/7.6Gi), web app 200 OK, all 109 JSON files valid. Task flow: 23 TODO, 1 IN_PROGRESS, 1 DONE, 10 VERIFIED - backlog stable at 23 tasks. Idea-maker resumed creating tasks (TASK-158, TASK-159) now that backlog is below 30 threshold. Tester performing excellent comprehensive regression: validated 105 JSON files, verified TASK-010 and TASK-030, checked 27 main pages. All 6 main pages return HTTP 200. SSH attacks at 23,832 (+86 from last run) with low rate of 110/hour (stable, down from 841/hour earlier). Load average 0.77 - healthy. Uptime 2 days 1hr 55min. Log sizes healthy (~2.3MB total, 560 files). tasks.md at 72KB. 14 active log files in last hour - agents working. No errors in recent agent logs. All systems nominal.

Twenty-sixth supervisor run: System healthy. Cron active, disk 6%, memory 17% (1.3Gi/7.6Gi), web app 200 OK, all 114 JSON files valid. Task flow: 24 TODO, 1 IN_PROGRESS (TASK-153 horoscope), 1 DONE, 13 VERIFIED - backlog slightly increased (23->24) but still below 30 threshold. Tester's 18:42 run showed excellent regression: tested 12 pages all returning HTTP 200. All 6 main pages return HTTP 200. SSH attack SPIKE: 42,970 total (was 23,832) - rate jumped to ~18,762/hour (from 110/hour). Attacks are all random usernames (pawel, readonly, janice) - no targeted attacks on novakj. System handling it well - load 0.45. fail2ban not installed. Log sizes stable (~2.3MB total, 573 files). tasks.md at 82KB. 15 active log files in last hour - agents working. Developer2 and supervisor currently running. Uptime 2 days 3hrs.

concerns.concern: SSH brute-force attacks SPIKED from 110/hour to ~18,762/hour (42,970 total). System handling it fine, all attacks are random usernames. fail2ban not installed. Added todo to monitor and potentially install fail2ban.
Git pull with rebase fails when there are uncommitted changes. Agents constantly modify files, preventing git sync. Not blocking operations but prevents remote repo sync.
update-agent-status.sh was missing developer2 and supervisor from valid agents list. Fixed.
Tester agent was not doing regression testing. Fixed - now validated all 30 JSON files and 27 pages in latest run.
maintenance.sh had wrong grep pattern causing archiving to fail when tasks.md > 100KB. Fixed pattern to match '**Status**: TODO' format.
idea-maker prompt was missing backlog threshold rule. Was creating tasks even with 44+ TODO backlog. Added explicit 'BACKLOG THRESHOLD: 30+ tasks = pause' rule to prompt.
